    • drawCharacters

      protected void drawCharacters(Map<Integer,CharacterCard> characterCards, Bag bag) throws Exception
      Draws three character cards and puts them in characterCards. The student discs required by some character cards are taken from bag. The CharacterCards action are not instantiated here but directly in GameEngine.startGame() as they need the game actions to be generated before.
      Parameters:
      characterCards - the list of the newly created character cards
      bag - the bag
      Throws:
      Exception - if one of the methods of CharacterManager throws an exception
      See Also:
      • CharacterCard
      • Bag

    • setUpIsland

      protected ArrayList<ArrayList<IslandTile>> setUpIsland()
      Creates the island groups, which are initially composed of a single island tile.
      Returns:
      the list of the island groups
      See Also:
      • IslandTile

    • placeMotherNature

      protected MotherNature placeMotherNature(ArrayList<ArrayList<IslandTile>> islandGroups)
      Creates the mother nature pawn and assigns to the newly created pawn a random island tile selected from the list islandGroups.
      Parameters:
      islandGroups - the list of island groups
      Returns:
      the mother nature pawn
      See Also:
      • MotherNature
      • IslandTile

    • generateStudentDiscs

      protected ArrayList<StudentDisc> generateStudentDiscs()
      Generates a list of 130 student discs (26 for each color).
      Returns:
      the list of student discs
      See Also:
      • StudentDisc

    • drawFromBagAndPutOnIsland

      protected void drawFromBagAndPutOnIsland(Bag bag, ArrayList<StudentDisc> studentDiscs, ArrayList<ArrayList<IslandTile>> islandGroups, int indexOfMotherNatureIsland) throws EmptyBagException
      Puts 2 student discs for each color in the bag, then draws the student discs from the bag and puts them on the island tiles. No student disc is put on the island tile containing the mother nature pawn and on the island tile opposite to the island with mother nature. The student discs are taken from studentDiscs.
      Parameters:
      bag - the bag from which the student discs are drawn
      studentDiscs - the list of student discs
      islandGroups - the list of island groups. Each group contains one island tile
      indexOfMotherNatureIsland - the index of the group containing the island tile with mother nature
      Throws:
      EmptyBagException - if the bag does not contain enough student discs

    • putRemainingStudentsInBag

      protected void putRemainingStudentsInBag(Bag bag, ArrayList<StudentDisc> studentDiscs)
      Puts all the remaining student discs of studentDiscs in the bag
      Parameters:
      bag - the bag
      studentDiscs - the list of student discs

    • setUpCloudTiles

      protected void setUpCloudTiles(ArrayList<CloudTile> cloudTiles)
      Creates one cloud tile for each player and adds the newly created cloud tiles to cloudTiles.
      Parameters:
      cloudTiles - the list of cloud tiles. This list is initially empty

    • setUpProfessors

      protected void setUpProfessors(ArrayList<ProfessorPawn> professorPawns)
      Creates one professor pawn for each color.
      Parameters:
      professorPawns - the list of professor pawns. This list is initially empty

    • setUpSchoolBoards

      protected void setUpSchoolBoards(ArrayList<SchoolBoard> schoolBoards)
      Creates a school board for each player. The newly created school boards are added to schoolBoards.
      Parameters:
      schoolBoards - the list of school boards. This list is initially empty

    • setUpTowers

      protected abstract void setUpTowers()
      Creates new towers and adds them to each team.

    • drawStudentsAndPlaceOnEntrance

      protected abstract void drawStudentsAndPlaceOnEntrance(Bag bag) throws SchoolBoardNotSetException, EmptyBagException
      Draws student discs from the bag and puts them on the entrance of the school board of each player.
      Parameters:
      bag - the bag from which the student discs are drawn
      Throws:
      SchoolBoardNotSetException - if a school board has not been set
      EmptyBagException - if the bag does not contain enough student discs

    • modifyRoundAndActionList

      public void modifyRoundAndActionList() throws Exception
      Modifies the Round class, which contains the actions that can be performed by the current player and the order of play, and the Action List in the Action Manager. After setup, players have to choose the Wizard.
      Specified by:
      modifyRoundAndActionList in class Action
      Throws:
      Exception - if something bad happens
